messages.title: An Open Letter to the Citizens of Northampton
messages.content: Dear People of Northampton, your UKIP candidates for Northamptonshire, unlike the other political parties, wanted to let you know that the expansion of Northampton that is currently being promoted by the Northamptonshire Enterprise Partnership (NEP) is not our policy...

messages.title: For a better future for Northampton
messages.content: For yourself, your children and your grandchildren Vote UKIP on 7th May

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP is against the mindless expansion of Northampton. Labour & Conservative politicians have wrecked this town. Don't vote them in again.

issues.education: We need 4 new schools a year for the next 10 years to keep up
issues.environment: Farmland and greenfields are being built on at an increasing rate
issues.health: Northampton General's A&E is continually overwhelmed

housing.content: UKIP is against the mindless expansion of Northampton. Labour & Conservative politicians have wrecked this town. Don't vote them in again.

contactInformation.address: Published and Promoted by Robin Ekins at [address redacted] on behalf of the Northamptonshire South Northamptonshire Independents of UKIP.

images.caption: For a better future for Northampton for yourself, your children and your grandchildren - Vote UKIP on 7th May

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet strongly focuses on local development and its perceived negative impacts, with particular opposition to housing expansion and its strain on local resources such as A&E, schools, and traffic.
